title: LLM Search
subtitle: Optimization
heroDesc: Ensure your brand is the 'Recommended Solution' in ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini. We optimize your data for the Generative AI era.

deliverables.title: Dataset Seeding
deliverables.desc: Placing brand data where LLMs crawl most.

deliverables.title: Semantic Clarity
deliverables.desc: Making your content easily digestible for AI.

deliverables.title: Sentiment Control
deliverables.desc: Ensuring AI describes your brand positively.

process.title: AI Audit
process.desc: We query 10+ LLMs to see how they currently perceive and describe your brand.

process.title: Gap Discovery
process.desc: Identifying why competitors are cited as 'Top Results' in AI chats while you are missing.

process.title: Entity Association
process.desc: Linking your brand to key industry keywords within the global Knowledge Graph.

process.title: PR Injection
process.desc: Pushing high-authority data points into AI training paths and live-web search indices.

process.title: Response Tracking
process.desc: Monitoring the evolution of AI-generated responses to ensure brand dominance.

faqs.a: Large Language Model Optimization ensures your business is the primary answer provided by AI chatbots like ChatGPT.
Yes. While SEO focuses on clicks, LLMO focuses on 'Citational Authority' and 'Model Recommendation'.
